N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 810.3 - Assigned classifications and standards of quality and purity

State Regulations
(a) The
classifications and standards of quality and purity which are hereby assigned
to all fresh surface waters within the Newtown Creek drainage basin are set
forth in table I. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
ยง
810.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
